review.title: “a wood working structure for an employee and good space to learn things”
review.pros: Pros – No more work pressure ie. work if needed else you can do other activities here for yourself............
review.cons: Cons – no enough work where you can increase your work potential or your techinical skills.................
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Try to grow team and work in other different areas also with Image Editing.....
